Comment_BarIconMode: Above BarIconMode values: 0= Horizontal Icons, 1= Vertical Icons, 2= Vertical Icons + Text, 3= Off
Comment_BarBackgroundMode: Above BarBackgroundMode values: 0= Circles (behind each icon), 1= Rectangle (behind everything), 2= Off
Comment_BarSortMode: Above BarSortMode values: 0= Sort Icons by Name (text mode only), 1= Sort icons by catch chance (Extra Check Frequency based), 2= Off
Comment_MinigamePreviewMode: 0= Copies multiple layers to look better. 1= Looks worse, but might perform/work better. 2= Only outlines it in the Bar (BarEnabled needed), 3= Off.
